sentences.en: A new method of fuel injection was developed during the war.
sentences.cn: 一种新的注油方法在战争期间发展起来.

sentences.en: Antiseptic is used to sterilize the skin before giving an injection.
sentences.cn: 杀菌剂被用于在注射前给皮肤消毒.

sentences.en: Dr Culver nervously muttered "Here goes," and gave the little girl an injection.
sentences.cn: 卡尔弗医生紧张地嘟囔了一句“要打了啊”，然后就给小女孩打了一针。

sentences.en: Execution by lethal injection is scheduled for July 30th.
sentences.cn: 定于7月30日执行注射死刑。

sentences.en: Giving every patient an annual anti - flu injection would be prohibitively expensive.
sentences.cn: 每年给每个病人注射 抗 流感针剂的花费是无法承受的.

sentences.en: He was executed by lethal injection earlier today.
sentences.cn: 他于今天早些时候被注射处死。

sentences.en: It has to be given by injection, usually twice daily.
sentences.cn: 它必须通过注射摄入，通常一天两次。

sentences.en: The best treatment is antibiotics, preferably by injection.
sentences.cn: 最佳的治疗方法是使用抗生素, 能够注射就更好.

sentences.en: The doctor gave her an injection to alleviate the pain.
sentences.cn: 医生给她注射以减轻疼痛.

sentences.en: The injection sent his leg into spasm .
sentences.cn: 一针打下去，他的腿就痉挛了。

sentences.en: The morphine was administered by injection.
The nurse gave me a tetanus injection.
sentences.cn: 护士给我打了破伤风预防针。

sentences.en: The only sure treatment is antibiotics, preferably by injection.
sentences.cn: 唯一有效的治疗方法是使用抗生素，最好是注射使用。

sentences.en: Those drugs are given by injection as well as through the mouth.
sentences.cn: 那些药品可以注射,也可以口服.

sentences.en: We used a combined regimen of injection treatment and radiation therapy.
sentences.cn: 我们采用了针剂注射和放射治疗相结合的方法.

sentences.en: Where's the baby which needs injection?
sentences.cn: 需要打针的婴儿在哪里?

words.tran_cn: 注射；注射剂；充血；射入轨道

phrases.tran_cn: 直接喷射；直接注入；直接射出法
燃油喷射系统；燃料喷入系统
注射模塑（法）；喷射铸造法
注入量；注射速率；喷吹率
蒸汽喷射，蒸汽注入；射汽法

trans.tran_cn: 注射，注射剂，[医]充血，（卫星等的）入轨
trans.tran_en: an act of putting a drug into someone’s body using a special needle
